name: horAIzon (Horror Jam)
description:
horAIzon by Eero Höök (Roikku)

Quick How To:

Press Space in the menu. Pick up items for score. Platform your way through to the end. As Threat increases, so does the enemy frequency, so don't stop to farm.

Controls (Gamepad also supported):

WASD/Arrows - move (dpad / LStick)

SPACE - Jump (A button)

Shift/Ctrl - Attack (R2 / X button)

F - Boomerang (R1)

Horror Jam - AI (2022)

entry by Eero Höök, made in GameMaker (GMS2)

Theme: AI

Theme usage: In a post apocalyptic world, AI has taken over the minds of the weak and houses itself in large machines.

Genre: 2D Action Side-scrolling Platformer

Features:

- All design, programming, art by the author.

- Audio from CC0 sources that did not require credits.

- Simplistic retroesque gameplay.

Support the Dev:

paypal.me/roikkudev
